================================================================

*If you have installed the sims 3 x in 1 after you uninstall the game ,you need to removed old register key first by follow step below :


Step 1 : Backup - saved game & custom content
----------------------------------------------

For saved game ,items in launcher ,screenshots ,library etc. \"The Sims 3\"

Windows Vista & 7: :userMy DocumentsElectronic ArtsThe Sims 3
Windows XP: :Documents and SettingsMy DocumentsElectronic ArtsThe Sims 3

For items,package files,Mods files,Resource.cfg file,and d3dx9_31.dll file (If you have)

C:Program FilesElectronic ArtsThe Sims 3Mods
C:Program FilesElectronic ArtsThe Sims 3Resource.cfg
C:Program FilesElectronic ArtsThe Sims 3GameBind3dx9_31.dll (If you have)


Step 2 : Uninstall the game and remove register key
----------------------------------------------------


1. Go to Start menu > Run > type \"regedit\"

Regedit windows will appear do follow this:

-Goto HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE > SOFTWARE > Right click \"Sims\" select Delete
-Goto HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE > SOFTWARE > Right click \"Electronic Arts\" select Delete
-Goto HKEY_CURRENT_USER > SOFTWARE > Right click \"Electronic Arts\" select Delete

2. Go to delete installshield information of game


-Goto HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE > SOFTWARE > Microsoft > Windows > Current Version > Uninstall Rightclick

{C05D8CDB-417D-4335-A38C-A0659EDFD6B8} select Delete
{117B6BF6-82C3-420C-B284-9247C8568E53} select Delete
{ED436EA8-4145-4703-AE5D-4D09DD24AF5A} select Delete
{BA26FFA5-6D47-47DB-BE56-34C357B5F8CC} select Delete
{71828142-5A24-4BD0-97E7-976DA08CE6CF} select Delete
{45057FCE-5784-48BE-8176-D9D00AF56C3C} select Delete
{910F4A29-1134-49E0-AD8B-56E4A3152BD1} select Delete

*(PS.If you without which one would not mind some sectors may not be into it)


3. Go to delete The Sims 3 folders

Goto :Documents and SettingsMy DocumentsElectronic Arts delete \"The Sims 3\" folder

Goto :Program FilesElectronic Arts
- delete The Sims 2
- delete The Sims 3 World Adventures
- delete The Sims 3 High End Loft Stuff
- delete The Sims 3 Ambitions
- delete The Sims 3 Fast Lane Stuff
- delete The Sims 3 Late Night
- delete The Sims 3 Living Outoor Stuff


Step 3 : Install the Game
----------------------------------------------------

1.Install Base Game
- Choose \"region code\" - only USA or UK
- Install EA Download Manager (auto) or download : http://eastore.ea.com/eadm
- Open EA Download Manager and update program (auto)
- Open Sims3Launcher.exe and update / crack the game

1.2.Install World Adventures
- Open Sims3Launcher.exe and update / crack the game

1.3 Install High End Loft Stuff
- Open Sims3Launcher.exe and update / crack the game

1.4.Install Ambitions
- Open Sims3Launcher.exe and update / crack the game

1.5.Install Fast Lane Stuff
- Open Sims3Launcher.exe and update / crack the game

1.6.Install Late Night
- Open Sims3Launcher.exe and update / crack the game

1.7.Install Outdoor Living Stuff
- Open Sims3Launcher.exe and update / crack the game

****** Play ******


How to update The Sims 3 
================================================================

Patching Guide <a href="
http://www.modthesims.info/wiki.php?title=Game_Help:TS3_Patching" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.modthesims.info/wiki.php?title=Game_Help:TS3_Patching</a>


Update via Sims3 Launcher:

1.Install EA Download Manager or download here http://eastore.ea.com/eadm
2.Open EA Download Manager
3.Open Sims 3 Launcher
4.Notification message box will appear ,if it not appear go to tab update in launcher then click refresh button.
5.Click Yes and wait for downloading
6.Install patch


Update Manually :

MacOSX : http://www.modthesims.info/wiki.php?title=Game_Help:TS3_Patching:Patch_Download/CurrentOSX
PC : http://www.modthesims.info/wiki.php?title=Game_Help:TS3_Patching:Patch_Download/Current


How to crack The Sims 3 Base Game
================================================================

DOWNLOAD CRACK HERE : http://www.thaithesims3.com/topic.php?topic=33724&page=1&cmode=1#post512934

For PC

1. Download Crack file
2. Extract file
3. Put \"TS3EP03.exe and TSLHost.dll\" files replace at game folder {:\\Programs file\\Electronic Art\\The Sims 3 Late Night\\Game\\Bin}


For MAC

1. Download Crack file
2. Extract file
3. Go to Applications then right click \"The Sims 3 Late Night\" folder then click \"Show Package Contents\".
4. Go to \"Contents/Resources/AddOns\".
5. Right click at The Sims 3 Late Night then select \"Show Package Contents\".
7. Put \"TS3EP03.exe and TSLHost.dll\" files replace at \"Contents/Resources/trangaming/c_Drive/Program Files/Electronic Arts/The Sims 3 Late Night/Game/Bin\"

*After finished installed the game and updated usually need to crack the game before play, because the game require the information from CD.
